page.title: 10SHOOTING & FISHING
page.content: THERE ARE 2 SPORTS IN THE REGION FOR THE LOCAL PEOPLE TO ENJOY - FISHING AND SHOOTING. THE FISHING IS FOR BROWN TROUT WHICH CAN BE FOUND IN THE RIVER EDEN, THE UPPER REACHES OF WHICH FLOWS THROUGH THIS QUIET VALLEY. THE FISHING RIGHTS ARE CONTROLLED BY THE ANGLING ASSOCIATION WHO ISSUE SEASONAL TICKETS TO WOULD-BE FISHERMEN. SPECIAL TICKETS ARE ALSO AVAILABLE TO VISITORS THE OPEN SEASON WHEN ONE IS ALLOWED TO TAKE FISH IS FROM MARCH TO SEPTEMBER AND A LIMIT OF FIVE PER DAY IS IMPOSED THE SHOOTING IS FOR GROUSE WHICH LIVE AND BREED ON THE HEATHER MOORS IN THE MORE REMOTE AREAS.THE SHOOTING RIGHTS ARE HELD BY THE LANDOWNERS WHO HOLD ORGANISED SHOOTS IN THE AUTUMN.THE BIRDS ARE THEN TAKEN AND SOLD FOR THE TABLE WHERE THEY ARE CONSIDERED TO BE A GREAT DELICACY.
